text: kya tumane un logon ko nahin dekha, jo daava to karate hai ki ve us cheez par eemaan rakhate hain, jo tumhaaree or utaaree gaee hai aur tumase pahale utaaree gaee hai. aur chaahate hai ki apana maamala taagoot ke paas le jaakar faisala karaen, jabaki unhen hukm diya gaya hai ki ve usaka inakaar karen? parantu shaitaan to unhen bhatakaakar bahut door daal dena chaahata hai
